Details

ReferencesFenny Desriani received the Bardach Prize for Outstanding Capstone project 2024-2025 for her work assessing the extent of internet access available to California schools in 2025.

  • Her project is published here:
  • Her map-based analysis of available bandwidth in every school is here
  • The ongoing and extensible analysis of network availability, with the additional dimensions of available computational power to support AI and the developing extension of new pedagogical systems to all students is here:
